description: Sin descripción

name: NFL Rivals: Football Game
description: Sin descripción

name: CraftCraft: Fantasy Merchant Simulator
description: CraftCraft is an RPG merchant sim with actual. Crafting. Create a tiara for a mermaid princess or a sword made of dragon blood - you choose! Express your creativity in your very own cozy crafting studio and change the lives of quirky locals in the mysterious port town of Windspell.

name: Wasteland Story
description: This is Wasteland Story. Pixel 2D Side Scroller Post-Apocalypse RPG! The player must survive and conquer the nuclear fallout tainted wasteland and carry out the secret mission to save mankind.

name: Houchi City
description: Sin descripción

name: Bail Force: Cyberpunk Bounty Hunters
description: Bail Force is an action roguelike about two bounty hunters in a cyberpunk setting. Play as one of two Bounty Hunters, and make your way to catch or neutralize dangerous criminals using various power-ups. Experience their missions and personal conflict stemming from concerns of a loved one.

name: Hard Minus Forever Standalone DLC
description: Hard Minus is coming back, if you hadn't enough adrenaline action in your gaming life.

name: College Bowl
description: College Bowl is a beautifully pixelated on-field simulation of American Football! Challenge college rivals on your way to winning a National title! Take on various game modes, including a deep Dynasty mode with in-depth recruiting, scouting, stat tracking, ranking, bowl games, yearly goals and more!

name: Tuna The Cat
description: Inspired by side scrollers from the 80's and 90's, Tuna The Cat is a true jump style side scroller. With todays graphics and yesterdays playstyle it's a combination for fun. Jump, slide, and run your way through 20 stages of colorful 2.5D excitement.

name: Medieval Idle: Quest
description: Medieval Idle: Quest is a captivating game that will transport you back to the middle ages. This idle game combines the elements of simulation and strategy to create a truly engaging experience for gamers of all ages.

name: Cube Airport
description: Cube Airport is a puzzle game where your objective is to construct a runway to enable the airplane to take off safely. To do this, you need to correctly fit the runway cubes into the indicated positions on the platform and proceed to the next level.

name: Eye of Saccharine
description: A girl suffering from hallucinations tries her best to live a normal life in the megapolis. She sees an advertisement for a certain doctor presenting a revolutionary technology for diagnosing and treating the psyche, "G.L.A.Z.A".

name: NoirNet: The Neon Enigma
description: Dive into a neon-lit world of mystery with NoirNet – The Neon Enigma! Solve gripping cyberpunk murder cases in this immersive, episodic detective game!

name: Cities: Skylines - Hotels & Retreats
description: Spruce up your City with the finest hôtellerie with “Hotels & Retreats”! Start with a small hotel chain and unlock more luxurious and specialized hotels as you make your way to a successful hotel business.

name: The Squeal of the Pig
description: The CEO of the biggest meat producing corporation is kidnapped by a cannibalistic serial killer that exclusively eats human flesh. The former fears being eaten, but the latter assures him he has other plans for him, including a special surprise.

name: Flappy Souls
description: A mix of Flappy Bird and Dark Souls

name: Doomsday Derby
description: Play this indie derby game! destroy the cars that want to destroy you with a powerful gun and missiles in a battle arena. Avoid the chickens and destroy the giant worm from the aliens! loot the destroyed cars and more in this fun mini game for windows

name: Trust Your Ears
description: You can see nothing, but you can hear something lurking in the darkness. Trust Your Ears is a unique mixture of on-rails shooter and audio horror game. Find all the key fragments and escape from the mysterious asylum.

name: Soulash 2
description: In a realm where gods have perished, a new era of strife has dawned. Seize power, forge legendary artifacts, conquer the world, and ascend to the divine throne in Soulash 2!

name: Rogue Labyrinth
description: Fight through the ranks in a monster-filled labyrinth created by an egocentric billionaire colonist. Make friends (or enemies) with rivals, employees, fans, and monsters to improve your abilities. The crowd wants a show, so hype them up in this rogue-lite narrative adventure!

name: Holy Ship
description: Get ready to battle other pirate ships on the high seas with Holy Ship - the ultimate local multiplayer party game!

name: When Night Comes
description: When Night Comes is an immersive and spine-chilling horror game. If you're a fan of survival horror games and want to test your skills against a terrifying demonic force, then this game is definitely for you. Are you brave enough to face the Entity? Play When Night Comes and find out!

name: Chef: Cocktails & Drinks
description: Tired of serving soda to your customers? It’s time to reach a whole new dimension of beverages with Chef: Cocktails & Drinks! Ranging from fruity booze to overpriced creamy coffee, you will have a new wide array of options at your disposal to gently decrease your customers’ bank account!

name: Dead Mire
description: An action packed endless wave zombie shooter with elements of tactics and resource management.

name: Hero Well
description: Hero Well is a grid-based roguelike RPG with a minimalistic aesthetic. Choose your hero, manage your resources, and prepare yourself to delve ever deeper into the unexplored wells to cleanse the vile beasts once and for all.

name: Darkblade Ascent
description: Darkblade Ascent is a fast paced First-Person Melee Roguelike RPG with randomly generated weapons and upgrades, unlockable new classes and persistent leveling. Hack and slash your way through atmospheric dark fantasy locations, unique monsters and bosses.

name: Dimraeth
description: A fantasy topdown multiplayer RPG. Features a combination of 8 races and 6 classes. Explore new lands, trade with villages, upgrade runes, unlock new spells, craft, and more! Team with your friends to raid dungeons for special hidden rewards. Defend Dimraeth and choose your own destiny.

name: Paint by Pixel 2
description: Create your pixel masterpiece today!

name: Costa Verde Transport Department
description: In Costa Verde you play as the Transport Department of a city slowly growing on a vibrant picturesque landscape. Build roads on a map of hexagonal tiles, plan road intersections, place roundabouts, plan out bus routes, and watch your whole city turn into one single massive traffic jam!

name: Unplug
description: Explore a dystopian world as a sentient TV Robot who plugs into robot bodies and objects in the environment to control them. Use their different abilities to overcome puzzles, help people and fight off an egomaniac tyrant.

name: Dracula’s Vengeance
description: Simple and refreshing casual action game!

name: Pandora
description: Pandora is a third-person action-adventure hack n slash game that combines teleportation and combat abilities. Take on the role of Phase, a cyber-enhanced super-soldier detained by their creator, Sai-Corp. Escape the orbital testing facility and earn the freedom they stole from you long ago.

name: Ginsha
description: Ginsha is a unique atmospheric pixelart Action Adventure Platformer with special Gravity Shield and Dash Mechanics. It combines a versatile Platformer core with RPG, Souls and Crafting Elements to an Anomaly among Metroidvania games.

name: Vertical Quest
description: Climb the treacherous tower in Vertical Quest, a challenging rogue-like game where you control a hero, overcome obstacles, and defeat the ultimate boss at the top!

name: Milites Fortunae
description: Welcome to Milites Fortunae, a stategy game where you control a team of warriors! Take turns with your opponent as your warriors perform attacks known as Abilities, to deplete enemy units health and claim victory!

name: Haunted: The Chronicles
description: Immerse yourself in the horror of Haunted: The Chronicles in solo or up to 4 player co-op. Play as a paranormal influencer, unlock equipment to document supernatural events, solve puzzles, and stay alive against the dark forces that lurk in the shadows.

name: Azure Orphanage
description: One day, while secretly searching for the Empire's heritage, orphan Niina encounters a "demon," believed to be a survivor of the war, in an unexplored cave. At the same time, various incidents unfold, gradually devouring the orphans’ daily lives...

name: Horror Amusement Park
description: "Horror Amusement Park" is a thrilling game that puts you in charge of creating your very own horror-themed amusement park.

name: Legion: Dead Metal
description: A secret government installation on a tropical island in international waters has gone dark LEGION has been sent in to investigate ,the installation was experimenting with a new power source and a mayday was received moments before contact was lost "Save yourself" was all that was heard

name: Champions of Quortz
description: This is not another platformer! Champions of Quortz is a 2D Boss Rush that focuses on repeatable boss fights and loot & character progression. Hack, blast and smash through bosses that become stronger with each victory. Make your Champions stronger by leveling, upgrading and equipping loot.

name: I'm In Charge
description: As "person in charge" in this game, you will travel to the scenes of classic negotiation events and become that crucial negotiator. Use your rhetoric to persuade the stubborn AI to give up their ideas.

name: Inflorescences
description: A visual novel strategy game where your floral fragrances determine the fate of your mysterious shop and its patrons. Make choices, talk to customers, and shape the story. Get ready for a journey of heartfelt connections and strategic decision-making.

name: Imperial Storm
description: Imperial Storm is a new style card strategy game. Recruit trustworthy followers to counter conspiracy and become a strong power in the court!

name: Gene Rain Wind Tower: Ultimate Edition
description: Gene Rain Wind Tower is a next-gen third person shooter game. The story is set in a futuristic world, with a linear narrative structure, and uses shocking visual effects to present a brand new world for the players ' enjoyment. ‘ULTIMATE EDITION' integrates all DLC content, you can experience new stories, you can get rare weapons, and the complete game experience will make you immersed in it.

name: Thunderday
description: Thunderday is a twin stick shooter following a group of friends and family fighting their way and traveling through multiple worlds after their home got destroyed. Choose your hero and start your journey to find and destroy the one responsible for it.

name: Bonds of Unity
description: A fast-paced first-person shooter with parkour elements. Go all-out with 50+ different guns and tools or even create your own guns with the weapon editor. Combine your loadout with synergizing weapons to take down all sizes of enemies and to unite the fallen land of Utopia!

name: Atomgrad
description: A linguistic detective game. Decrypt the Soviet computer to prevent total nuclear annihilation.

name: Sainthood
description: Sainthood is a cozy strategy game about serving your community and growing your faith. Explore a miniature world and help the islanders by constructing buildings, delivering resources, and volunteering. Pray and attend to other spiritual activities as you rise to become a Saint!

name: Goremon
description: Explore and collect the powerful Goremons in a world where the energy of these creatures is everything. Make important decisions, and face dangers in a world full of mysteries and challenges. Goremon will take you on an epic adventure. Begin your journey in the world of Goremon!

name: Rusty's Day Off: Episode One - Janitor on Duty
description: Rusty's Day Off is a stylized FPS metroidvania in which you play as a janitor caught up in a wild adventure on his day off. Armed with your gadgets, you must navigate through complex facilities, solve puzzles, defeat rogue robots and jump & run your way through this day.

name: General Staff: Black Powder
description: The General Staff: Black Powder Wargaming System is the ultimate in simulating 18th and 19th century battles. Built around the mate AI it comes with dozens of battles (Waterloo, Gettysburg, Little Big Horn (with alternative scenarios including Gatling guns), Antietam, and more.

name: Binding of Elements
description: In this action-rougelike game you'll have to survive waves of monsters and fight against bosses. You'll be able to combine different elements to get unique abilities and arm yourself against the challenges. Choose from a variety of upgrades and improve your character or abilities.

name: Mr. Stretch and the Stolen Fortune
description: Stretch from platform to treasure in this unique, supernatural puzzle-platformer game.

name: Need for Drifting
description: "Need for Drifting" is an adrenaline-fueled game that is perfect for anyone who loves the thrill of drifting and the excitement of competition.

name: Platform Tower
description: Can you jump?

name: Eyeser
description:
Eyeser is a brilliant puzzle game that will have you thinking in ways that you never had before.
Imagine that everything around you becomes invisible and there are 2 laser eyes will help you to see the object as single line. Imagine too that the line of laser scanning moved rapidly over the object, displaying tiny slices of the thing as it did so. Do you think you could guess what was showing on Eyeser just by viewing this one line?

name: Hidden Expedition: New Adventures Steve and Victoria
description:
In each ancient civilization there is a hidden medallion. Find four medallions in order to find the Diamond Eye. It can make any wish come true.

Victoria and her best friend Steve are looking for adventure in the Far East. They are after the lost Atlantis and they have a map left from the grandfather. Concentrate on the objects and pick up the right items to solve the exotic puzzle.

name: Roald Dahl's Twit or Miss
description:
Every time Mr Twit eats, foulsome food flies towards Mrs Twit who is trying to sleep. Score by stopping the mouldy morsels hitting her. But watch out because if she wakes up she'll whack Mr Twit with her stick and then it's game over!
Psssst … here are a few tips to become a top twit!

name: I, Gladiator Scratch'em
description: I, Gladiator Scratch'em is the prequel to the highly anticipated I, Gladiator full game. The Scratch'em game allows players to win points that lead to a special surprise that can be used in the full game.

name: Blocky Highway
description:
Blocky Highway is about racing traffic, avoiding trains, collecting cars and most importantly having fun. Collect coins, open prize boxes to get new cars and complete collections! Drive at full speed to score big and be the #1.
Crash time! Control your car after crash, hit traffic cars for extra score!

name: Cyber Citizen Shockman
description: Slash and shoot your way through robots rampaging in Shockman's town!

name: King Jister 3
description: A classic medieval point & click first person adventure game.

name: The Blood Mage by Daniel da Silva
description: The Blood Mage is a fast-paced Puzzle/RPG hybrid. Reach the powerful blood crystal!

name: MalViolence: Definitive Edition
description: Caution: Escape from this supervillain at your own risk...A sci-fi visual novel packed with brain-teasing puzzles.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles: Tokyo
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Merge Star
description:
In a time not too long ago, there was a warrior that could merge any 2 items into 1.
The Warrior has journeyed many areas and encountered powerful monsters. There was no need to worry, for the Warrior got more powerful by merging items.

name: Triviador World
description:
Triviador is a unique game genre that offers more than a simple quiz game. Conquer territories and attack castles while answering trivia questions. Test your knowledge and use your strategy skills.

You can join the competition, enter tournaments and gain a top place in the Rank Lists and reap the rewards!
Reach the highest League with a well-chosen strategy! Defeat your enemies and be a trivia champion!

Make a clan (or join one), play and chat with thousands of trivia fans. Invite your best friends for a friendly quiz match, rate player-submitted question, or create your own.

Customize your world - create a unique avatar, expand your village and upgrade your buildings for increased rewards and gold. Be creative while you expand your Empire of Knowledge!

name: Knock & Run
description: Grab an orb and prepare to fight - It's about to go down. Compete your friends and knock down everyone!

name: Heroes of Orn: Darkness
description: Inspired by Majesty, Heroes of Orn: Darkness is a fantasy base building RTS with a twist - you cannot directly control your units. Build and upgrade your kingdom to gain power and resources. Influence your heroes' decisions and empower them by issuing quests, casting spells, and creating shops.

name: Peraglees: The Ooloufian Resistance
description: Peraglees - The Ooloufian Resistance is the first furry fandom video game to kick-ass and chew fur! With retro inspired visuals and authentic FM music to keep the action pumping while you blast through hordes of enemies. Peraglees is an Action Arcade shooter with RPG elements in Story mode.

name: Endless Apocalypse
description: Endless Apocalypse is a thrilling shooter game that takes you on a never-ending journey through different levels. Unlike zombie games, it features a unique set of enemies and bosses that require your quick reflexes and careful planning to defeat.

name: Mary X
description:
Mary X is a fun, addicting puzzle game with original gameplay and great music, visual and story. It is addicting and so much fun. Combine numbers to make king and queen , make Queen Mary's dynasty continue..
The new version with a new game mode just like a new game. It will give you a totally different experience.

name: Touch Point Tennis
description: Win the match. Raise the trophy. Become the greatest! Do you have the reflexes, strategy, and tennis skill to defeat your rivals all year long?

name: The Revived Throne
description:
With the power of the dead, claim your rightful place in your throne, capture the despicable enemies, sign contracts with other lords, fight epic battles, and destroy anyone who stands in your way.
You lost everything because of an unexpected betrayal, but the power of the dead revived you and gave you a second chance. Rule your city and build an undead army, return to the battlefield, slay the traitors, send your army to sack their cities, destroy their army and capture their champions for your use! Real-time battles full of strategies will give you more than enough space to show your worth as a commander!

name: 4 En Raya
description: A puzzle game from Spain. Line up your pieces 4 in a row either vertically, horizontally or diagonally. You can also shoot your opponent's piece to cancel their turn. This game is very similar to the popular board game Connect 4. The title translates into English as '4 In A Row'.

name: Hexaverse Adventures
description: Experience the thrill of exploration in our VR game. Collect resources, battle through new challenges, and discover a mysterious new world. Play as a sword-wielding adventurer, aided by a trusty robot companion. Our playable demo showcases our unique concept, with plans for more levels, features, and interactions to come.

name: 500 GP
description: Sin descripción

600 is a maze game where the player is a turtle trying to bring baby turtles, called 'kidturtles' to their homes while avoiding beetles. Scattered throughout the maze are boxes with question marks on them. When the player walks over a question mark, a baby turtle will crawl onto the main turtle's back, a house will appear at a random location on the map, and the player will have to bring the baby turtle to its house while avoiding beetles.

Other times, beetles will come out of the boxes, which the player will have to quickly run away from. The player's only offensive move is the ability to drop "smart bombs" to temporarily stun the beetles. The player's smart bombs can be refilled by grabbing the smart bombs in the middle of the maze. However, unlike actual smart bombs, the player's bombs do not move and stay in a single place until a beetle runs over it.

You have eight floors to deal with the beetles, then you'll go to the roof to get your baby turtles, after you go get them, you walk home with the rest of the baby turtles you collected. The game pattern is endless.

name: Rainbow High: Runway Rush
description: Play as the Rainbow High girls, explore the school and use their unique talents to complete your first art assignment. #LetYourTrueColorsShine

name: 99 Bottles of Beer
description: This fun video slot sports a barroom theme, complete with frosty mugs of beer, a colorful cast of bar patrons and Lou, everyone's favorite bartender.

name: A Day In Space
description: Sin descripción

name: Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Collector's Edition
description:
Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon - Collector's Edition, exclusive to Bandai Namco Store, comes with the full game, plus the following items:

Armored Core Figurine - Size 19 cm
Steelbook - Original art Steelbook case
Pin Badges - A set of 4 pin badges featuring in-game emblem patterns
Stickers - A set of 45 stickers to personalize your computer, mobile phone, etc.
Artbook - An exclusive 40-page hardcover artbook. Dive deep into the world of the game with never-before-seen visuals
Digital Soundtrack - The complete original soundtrack

name: Jagged Alliance 3: Tactical Edition
description:
Introducing the Jagged Alliance 3 Tactical Edition!
This comprehensive kit is housed in a sturdy and waterproof case, ensuring your gear remains safe and dry. The Tactical Belt with a Belt Pouch provides quick and easy access to your essential items, while the A.I.M. pin showcases your allegiance to the cause.

Get to know the characters of Jagged Alliance with a set of 36 character cards, each showcasing their professions and personalities. As you strategize and plan your next move, immerse yourself in the game's atmosphere with the official soundtrack on CD. With the Jagged Alliance 3 Tactical Edition, you'll be fully prepared to take on whatever challenges come your way!

Here's the full overview:
- The Game on disc in a limited Media Book
- Outdoor case, 100% water- and dustproof & IP67 certified
-- Outer dimensions: 258 x 243 x 118 mm
-- Inner dimensions: 235 x 180 x 106 mm
- Heavy Duty Tactical Belt for your pants
- Tactical Belt Pouch for your gadgets
- A.I.M. Pin
- Set of 36 Character Cards
- Original Soundtrack on disc

This item is worldwide limited to 750 orders.

name: Zapling Bygone: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Zapling Bygone Deluxe Edition will include:
- Physical Game
- Original Soundtrack
- Zapling Pin
- Mini Cómics
- Collector's Box

name: The Sarah Jane Adventures: Alien Alliance
description: A Flash web game from The Sarah Jane Adventures website, a spin-off series of Doctor Who. Match up the aliens to score the most points.

name: Medieval HD
description:
Welcome to Medieval - arcade action at it’s finest. Stunning graphics, outstanding audio, and addictive gameplay combine to make a gaming experience of epic proportions.

Leave the magic fairies, silly plants, and spells to the others - Medieval is a great castle defense game in its purest and most satisfying form. Where archers and armour, bombs and boulders, catapults and cauldrons...all battle it out in defense of your castle and your honor.

name: BlockMill
description:
Get ready to own buildings, streets or even neighborhoods in BlockMill, the exciting new social game and platform where real estate meets the virtual world! Blurring the lines of reality and the metaverse, in BlockMill you can buy any building you love from the real world around you, with everyone playing on the same map.

BlockMill is packed with fun missions and challenges that reward you with upgrades, alternatively, skip ahead and buy items that enable you to customize your buildings in ways you never thought possible.. Want to make your home higher than a skyscraper or add a picture of your beloved pet to the roof, or how about snagging a rival sports stadium for your own personal use? The sky really is the limit! If you want to switch up, you can trade buildings with other players, or even gift buildings to friends and family.

And the best part? BlockMill is super accessible and can be played on any device, anywhere in the world, without any downloads! So whether you're on your computer, phone, or tablet, you can start building your global real estate empire today!

name: Saga of the Shattered Swords
description: A person who "resurrected from the dead" has led to 20 years of grievances and entanglements. A wish of "resurrection", revealing the historical truth of the 15th century. Shenzhou and Schicksal, Taixuan and Tianqiong, Seven Disciples and Five Essences... All the mysteries from 500 years ago are solved here.

name: 3X3 Puzzle
description: A compilation of three puzzle games, developed by Ace Enterprise.

name: Fruit Slice
description: Slice fruit by your finger, and enjoy fruit juice! Can you be Master Shifu of Fruit?

name: MX vs. ATV: Untamed
description: Sin descripción

name: Labyrinth
description: Labyrinth is the classic game where you control a steel ball by tilting a wooden labyrinth. The game has over 1000 levels created by the community and you can easily create more levels of your own.

name: Anicon: Animal Complex
description:
Clena, your average everyday girl, finds herself in front of a circus filled with lovely animals. However, she quickly discovers that they are not ordinary animals — they are actually human boys who can transform into animals!

To ensure her silence, she has no choice but to work under them - cleaning, sweeping, and keeping things in order - or at least, that is how it appears on the surface. Their underlying goal, however, is for her to fall in love with one of the boys!

name: Oxygen Cocktail
description: Embark on a captivating adventure in Oxygen Cocktail, an open-world visual novel game. Solve puzzles, make friends, and uncover secrets in a charming rural village. Immerse yourself in a unique aesthetic that blends isometric pixel art and other styles.

name: Secret of Mana: Relocalized
description:
Secret of Mana - Relocalized focuses on updating, uncensoring, and "relocalizing" gameplay, graphical, and text (both script and non-script) elements of Secret of Mana.

Death Machine: AKA Kettle Kin gets restored to its full uncensored chainsaw wielding glory. Not only is this a graphical hack, it also rewrites the its AI to perform just as it did in the original Japanese release.

Teleportation Circles: When Square released this game in 1993 Nintendo of America had strict policies against religious imagery appearing in its titles. The six-pointed stars in the teleportation circles were reduced to triangles. This hack restores them to their original appearance.

Title Screen Background: When Square ported this game over to English, they butchered the original background image. Because of some graphical problems they cropped the image of the full Mana Tree at its roots and expanded it. The result is a blurry pixelated mess. Relocalized restores the original image.

Opening Text Crawl: Relocalized updates the opening text crawl to that of the superior HD version.

Mixed Case Character Names: This features adds lowercase letters to the character naming screen.

Relocalization: The titular feature. This hack takes the game’s outdated, awkward, and inaccurate text and script elements and localizes them differently. Just like with FuSoYa’s hack before it, Relocalized holds true to the style of beloved 90’s Squaresoft translator, Ted Woolsey.

name: Ace
description: An old air battle game that features dogfights between 2 biplanes.

name: Doctor Who: Art Attack
description: Art Attack was an online game based the Doctor Who episode Fear Her. The game is played as the Tenth Doctor. He is trapped in a drawing and must connect the dots on three different levels to find the Tardis.

name: Cup of Ethanol
description: A free platformer game with a bunch of unique enemies and landscapes. Jump your way through 24 different levels to find that delicious pint.

name: Apex Legends: Arsenal
description:
Before the Apex Games, a more brutal competition held sway: the Thunderdome Games! Here, sibling fighters Sok Leng and Kit Siang Phua reigned supreme. They were joined by August Brinkman, Sok Leng’s eventual husband. But when August’s selfish playstyle led to Kit Siang’s death, August would retreat from the Games, from Sok Leng, and from their young son, Nate.

August spent decades as a recluse. When Nate decides to follow his family’s legacy into the arena, August returns to strike a deal to reenter the Games in his son’s place.

name: Office Chimp
description: Smooth talk and manipulate your way to the top in this simulation-like anti-establishment game. Interact with your favorite Anime characters and gain their affections.

name: Anicon: Animal Complex - Party
description:
The final chapter of Anicon: Animal Complex.

Summer is coming. The entire crew is having a three-day camp together where they meet someone unexpected. Will the truth behind the family be uncovered? What future awaits them? Follow Clena and the animal boys in this fun and heartwarming finale!

name: Farhoud Farmand's The Mountaineer
description:
Farhoud Farmand's The Mountaineer (کوهنورد in Persian) is a 2D platformer that tells the story of Faad, an up-and-coming climber that enters a mountaineering competition known as "The Excellent Climber" with the goal of glory and receiving the certification necessary to be a mountain ranger.

When faced with the unfortunate news that three wanted criminals have fled custody and are causing chaos in the same mountain range as the competition, Faad has to use his natural gifts and wit to overcome his competitive obstacles also bring the fugitives to justice.

name: Gobliiins5
description: A great adventure in 2d for all ages. 16 big levels full of puzzles.

name: Omega Genesis
description:
Ever since May 2022, a file named "Omega Genesis" has been spread in small forums, imageboards and communities throughout the internet. What seems like a cute puzzle game at first hides a variety of mysterious secrets around every corner. There is nothing known about the original creator "Samuel Lazarus", who (besides putting their name in the game) seems to have no digital footprint and is not interested in the discourse around the game. The earliest someone we contacted aquired the game was in early May, where they downloaded it from a link, posted in a thread on a popular imageboard. Up until now the only way to get the game was to get in contact with one of the few, who downloaded it. Now the game is finally available for everyone to explore for themselves.

Please proceed with caution as the game features frightening visuals and hasn't been fully explored by the community yet! We cannot tell you what you might encounter. Play the game at your own risk!

name: Super Naruto: Clash of Ninja! 4
description: Super Naruto: Clash of Ninja! 4 (SCON4), alternatively known as Super Naruto: Gekitou Ninja Taisen! 4 (SGNT4) or simply "Super", is a fan-modified version of Naruto: Gekitou Ninja Taisen! 4 (GNT4) for the Nintendo GameCube. GNT4 covered the Naruto story until the end of Part One and was released only in Japan. In addition to being translated into English, SCON4 features numerous balance changes, added mechanics, custom animations for new moves, new stages, and quality-of-life improvements.

name: Doctor Who: Black Hole
description: The TARDIS must escape the black hole by bouncing on asteroids and comets that are in its path and avoiding space debris.

name: Mr.T Survival
description: Mr.T Survival is a survival game set in the wild jungle of nature. Players take on the role of Mr.T, a backpacker on his travel journey who encounters an accident that leaves him stranded on a remote and unfamiliar island. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style

name: Overdrive Escape
description: Enter the neon-lit world of Overdrive Escape, 3D first-person shooter game that will test your skills. Explore randomly generated levels, fight against waves of enemies, and choose your weapons wisely. Play now and see if you have what it takes to make it out of the city alive!

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles: Venice
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Cities of the World Jigsaw Puzzles: Sao Paulo
description: Do puzzles in a new puzzle way! Advanced puzzle layout and involving gameplay will help you to relax after a hard-working day. The player can choose to play with 30, 42, 117, or 285 pieces.

name: Michi: Expansion Pack
description: Unlock 8 new levels in Michi, the roguelite auto battler. Face tougher Aibos, discover powerful relics, and collect exclusive Aibos to strengthen your team. Dive deeper into the ever-changing forest and enhance your Michi experience.

name: Risk: Global Domination - Universal Domination Map Pack
description: Taking global domination into a battle for universal conquest in these 4 new space maps.

name: Serial Cleaners: Dino Park
description: Clean up the crime scenes on a mysterious island inhabited by dinosaurs, in Serial Cleaners - Dino Park DLC.

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Floral Nostalgia Set
description: Flowers are a timeless Mother's Day classic.

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Orchid Dreams Set
description: Passionate purple decorations for moms!

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza: Vintage Sunshine Set
description: Walk into the cozy sunshine with these decors!

name: Qrgan Quarter
description: Sin descripción

name: Robolt
description: Run fast and shoot faster as a little robot with a ton of firepower!

name: Laserpitium
description: Blast off on a critical mission to free the galaxy from artificial governance in this side-scrolling 2D shoot’em up!

name: Flappy Pixel!
description:
Easy, Simple but Addictive!
A tiny pixel flaps against the gravity to go through geometric obstacles in PIXEL world.
Tap and keep your only pixel moving forward. Or this fragile pixel will be bumped and scattered into minute particles.
Good luck!

name: Ore Rush
description: Sin descripción

name: Metal Max Balls
description: Sin descripción

name: Legendary Blacksmith
description:
You can challenge to be a legendary blacksmith.
If you are sick of enhancement, now it is a turn to conquer it.

name: Coin Factory Idle: Money Games
description: Meet Prof. Kruzenshtern, his incredible contraptions and talented friends on their quest to explore the world of mad science and build the ultimate factory. Mine for resources, fuel steam engines, launch drones and balloons - and gain income from all of this.

name: Candy Zero
description: 200 levels in one world. Complete one level, you can find a sweet cat and get coin. You can unlock more worlds.

name: Roamaor
description:
In Roamaor, the challenge is to combine characters into words.
The words of the puzzles are from poetry. You can feel the rhyme of poetry while solving the puzzles.
There are various kinds of monsters and obstacles blocking your way, so the strategy is crucial.

name: Hidden Objects Fantasy Games
description: Become overwhelmed by enchantment by playing this excellent fantasy game! It is a final hour to discover hidden things in beautiful pictures of fantasy world! Join the little forest fairy in this amazing mystic fantasy game! Let your imagination go wild while you lose yourself in awesome fairy tales of the enchanted forest!

name: Hover Cross Skills
description: Hover Cross Skills is a Old School Top Down Racer which gives you opportunity to drive different Hovercraft. This is very exciting game with fun filled tracks in which you are able to drive the Hovercraft in beach,forest and rivers. The levels itself are very challenging and rewarding. Incredible physics engine makes the game look and behave realistically.

name: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Proto
description:
This prototype is an is an interpretation of various development phases of the game based on the Alttp prototype assets. This is not an authentic prototype nor does it represent a single or specific point of development.

This is a result of 4 months (maybe 5) of “behind the scenes” hard work, a few assembly hacks and fixes etc. This game was known as A Link To The Past and only has been renamed into A Link To The Proto for the release to stand on it’s own.

There is a lot of changes, prototype assets that made it into the game, but unfortunately due to the multiple iterations of the same tilesets and a rather limited space for graphics, only a few select ones made it into the reconstruction.

But still, there is a lot of places to explore and many unseen things to discover from the proto content that was cut from the final vanilla game by Nintendo.

name: Zoo and Wild Animals Mod: Rebuilt
description: The Zoo and Wild Animals Mod: Rebuilt Mod was made to improve on the original ZAWA mod by adding better animations, behaviors, models and tons of special features! We are planning on adding a total of 100 new species to minecraft over the course of 3 major releases! We are working towards adding the full variety and wonder of the Earth's wildlife to minecraft, from the smallest tree frogs to the massive humpback whale to the intelligent chimpanzee! Alongside the animals is a variety of blocks, plants, items and weapons to help the player survive in the wild, capture animals, and build the best zoo possible! Explore the Wild, Educate yourself on the Animals, and Engineer the world's coolest Zoo!

name: Aaaaxy
description: A nonlinear 2D puzzle platformer taking place in impossible spaces.

name: Let's Bully Nash
description: Let's Bully Nash is a short adventure game about an ex-magicalgirl trying to rescue her fish girlfriend despite the world's refusal to take her seriously. It has a single dungeon, where the boss has vore animations and a "bad end" visual novel segment.

name: Goodnight Tea
description: Goodnight Tea is a small game about a small fairy wanting to go to bed, but needing her girlfriends to snuggle!

name: Dead Girl's Notebook
description:
Dead Girl's Notebook is a visual novel about love, personal growth, self-acceptance, masochism, etc. haphazardly assembled across 15 days for Variety Megajam 2021.

It has 10 chapters, and a little over 20,000 words of narration and dialogue. It is probably around 1 to 2 hours long, depending on how quickly you read. (If you use "auto mode", which advances text automatically at a relaxed pace, it is about 2 hours and 15 minutes long.)

name: When the Strawberry Muffin Ate a Goth
description: This is a short story about two girls meeting one night, taking a liking to each other, and exploring themselves further. Weighing in at around ~7.5k words, it is more akin to a kinetic novel, except for the lack of images.

name: Mouse: P.I. For Hire
description: Join private detective John Mouston in MOUSE, a gritty, jazz-fueled shooter. With guns blazing and a retro rubber hose animation style, battle your way through a corrupt city full of crooks and danger. Inspired by classic FPS and noir films, MOUSE is the explosive shooter you've been waiting for.

name: Zombie Apocalypse: Survival Stories
description: Experience a zombie apocalypse in a visual novel packed with excitement, action, and shocking decisions as you fight to survive in a world infested with the undead.

name: Multiplayer Military
description: Multiplayer Military - Aliens are invading the Military Base. The World needs Your Help. You and Your team of Elite Soldiers must take out all Aliens and Save the Planet.

name: Grand Tanks: WW2 Tank Games
description: Play Grand Tanks for free, unlock new war machines, explore realistic arenas, enjoy the amazing graphics. Constantly updated content that includes techniques, maps, missions, events, and much more. Everything for free and was created to let you enjoy fast and furious blitz battles.

name: Saint Hell
description: Saint Hell is a 2D RPG in which you will need to choose the side of angels or demons and lead them to victory.

name: Multiplayer Turtles
description: Multiplayer Turtles - Evil Frogs are attacking the Turtle Temple. You and Your elite team must Hack & Slash Your way to get rid of the invaders.

name: DriftCE
description:
DriftCE is the definitive drifting simulation videogame.

Take the car to your garage, where you can make major modifications to it. Customising the car, swapping various parts and performing crucial changes tangibly affects car’s performances and behaviours on the track. Replace engine, suspension and exhaust parts yourself to achieve the right performance for your driving style! Create a one of a kind car with visual tuning - change body kits, paint color and decals.

A simulative experience, carefully recreated to deliver the same feeling real drifters get. A fully immersive drifting simulation - with real licensed cars and tracks - featuring different drifting styles: power drift, handbrake and clutch kick.

name: Torchlight: Infinite - Cube of Rapacity
description: Torchlight: Infinite will commence its Global Launch on May 10th, introducing the new season, "Cube of Rapacity."

name: Dread Weight
description: You are being hunted by the ancient witch Baba Yaga. Can you make the right decisions to survive? Or will spirits overtake the mansion?

name: Duel Heroes
description: Sin descripción

name: 40 Winks
description: A cancelled version of 40 Winks, which was cancelled in an early stage and was never officially announced. A prototype was sold on the internet on 2021, being the first time it became publicly known.

name: Valeria the Pagan Priestess
description: Valeria the Pagan Priestess is a savage and sexy celebration of old-school dark fantasy themes, modernized with visceral hack-and-slash combat!

name: Aria and the Mysterious Mushroom
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Video Golf
description: Super Video Golf is a turn based 90s themed golf game, with up to 8 players locally or 4 computers online allowing a total of 16 players in a single game. Offline modes include a tutorial, CPU opponents and a driving range.

name: Ignored and Humiliated by Gamer Girls
description: Hello, it's Aria. It seems some gamers are being cruel to me today and making me lick their feet!! How humiliating!!

name: Aria's Small Adventure!
description: Hello, it's Aria. I became small somehow, and I'm being tormented by a normal sized girl. What kind of cruel things will she do to me?? Let's find out!

name: Crux
description: A puzzle game about rock climbing.

name: Chocolate Cavern
description: A simple casual game. Control Licorice as you run through the chocolate caverns and avoiding the ghouls.

name: Grandma Green
description:
Help a lonely Grandma build her new home!
Play as a lonely widow and pursue her dreams of growing a beautiful garden!

name: Neon City
description: Welcome to Neon City, a virtual reality city-building game that combines the charm of block toys with cutting-edge hand-tracking technology.

name: Bloompunk
description: Set in a lush world of living plants, in Bloompunk you must use steampunk technology, harness the power of the sun, grow your living arsenal of weapons and abilities, and fight back against an invasive ravenous force to reset the world's natural balance. Enhance your body with deadly weaponry that's a merge of plant and machine in this fast-paced, chaotic frenzy of bullets and thorns.

name: Bomb Buddies
description: In Bomb Buddies, solve puzzles, crack codes, and test your dexterity with a friend...but watch out! Everything is not as it seems when a nefarious hacker gets involved. When the stakes are high can your skills still hold up to the test?

name: Birds Aren’t Real
description: As a government surveillance pigeon drone, you'll engage in missions, sneak around the city, and use your creative thinking to manipulate the townsfolk and dispel their suspicions about your totally not-real Avian Task Force.

name: Eye 4 Eye
description: Embark on a mission to unveil the truth behind a missing daughter case. Utilize the search engine to gather clues and uncover the dark secrets of TempleTech. Experience a suspenseful journey through the eyes of Hazel.

name: Manas
description: Manas is an action-adventure game set in medieval Central Asia that immerses you in a land of mountains, valleys, and nomadic culture. Inspired by the Kyrgyz epic of the legendary hero, Manas, you'll defend your village against ruthless invaders with the aid of your faithful steed, Akkula. Through engaging visuals and innovative mounted combat, witness the beginning of Manas' epic journey!

name: Convergence: A League of Legends Story - Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition of Convergence: A League of Legends Story includes:
- Star Guardian Ekko Skin Pack
- Ruined Ekko Skin Pack
- Convergence Digital Comic and Art Book

Rewind the Past, Control the Future

Traverse the sprawling city of Zaun as Ekko, a young inventor with a device to rewind time. He and his friends must work together to keep their city safe, but as danger looms and secrets come to light, Ekko realizes he can't trust anyone—not even himself.

name: Bounda Forever
description: A lovely style of painting rogue-like games. In the game you face a tide of enemies, defeat them, and survive. The game offers many weapons to help you win. No long story, no ending, any time you can be reckless to a game.

name: Halfway to Dawn
description: A cinematic short narrative/arcade horror game for the Playdate

name: Meo+
description: A Super Mario Bros. demake for the Playdate.

name: Classical Contraption
description:
The Classical Contraption helps you learn classic poetry in a fun and engaging way.
Each line of the poem is presented in the contraption one line at a time. The words are randomly scrambled differently each time. Simply select the words in the correct order.
Enjoy 100 year old poetry on a modern device styled to look like an old victorian steampunk contraption!
Selected poems are from a variety of compilations that will appeal to both young and old!

name: Miles From Tomorrowland: Missions
description: Get ready to take your space adventure to the next level as you outrun tidal waves and escape the Flickorax with Miles Callisto and his robo-ostritch best friend, Merc, from the new Disney Junior series, 'Miles from Tomorrowland!' Journey with Miles on rescue missions, and use cool tools and tricks to dodge asteroids, collect rare space rocks, and turbo boost your way through this blastastic deep-space race!

name: Sushi Cat Words
description: Sushi Cat is always looking for new tasty treats to fill its belly! In Sushi Cat Words, you'll find all sorts of mouth-watering sushi dishes for our rotund hero. You'd better have eaten plenty of brain food, though. The only way to feed that feline is by searching out words in hundreds of levels of puzzling fun. Find big words, small words, words that go up, words that go down, or words that go all the way around.

name: Bowmaster 2: Archery Tournament
description: Bowmaster 2, the sequel to the immersive #1 worldwide hit archery game is finally here with a brand new free to play tournament! The Merry Five are back to reclaim the Bowmaster mantle so draw your bow, take aim and release your inner Robin Hood once again!

name: Flabby Santa
description:
Flabby Santa has dropped all of his presents while on a practice run for the big day!
Help him fly across the ever changing landscape of the North Pole and pick up his lost presents.
Along the way you can roll snowballs downhill to score bonus points. The further they roll the bigger they get and the higher the bonuses.
Avoid the obstacles, because Santa isn't wearing a helmet!
If he gets hit he'll drop all his presents first.
If he doesn't have any presents, it's Game Over!
High Scores are saved for the most presents collected and bonus points scored during a single level.
Every level is unique with increasing difficulty, meaning that no two games will be the same.
Easy to pick up, but difficult to master when the levels become more challenging.
Can you save the holidays?

name: Dream League Soccer
description: Soccer as we know it has changed! Dream League Soccer is YOUR chance to build THE best team on the planet. Recruit new Players, upgrade your Stadium, and train your team as you march towards glory, on your road to Soccer Super Stardom!

name: Valhalla Wars
description:
Plan your attack!
This unique strategy game allows you to plan lines of attack for your army. You can bluff and deceive your opponents in real time. Watch as other players fall into your traps, and helplessly give ground to your brilliant strategies.
Build an army with dozens of unique units. Plan attacks together with your allies, and agree together on which strategic positions to conquer on the map.
You have never played anything like this! Deep, true strategy, in a convenient mobile package.

name: Shopping Clutter 7: Food Detectives
description: Shopping Clutter 7 - Food Detectives unwraps a shocking investigation. The Walker family restaurant has been targeted by a criminal, and now all their recipes are gone! Follow the clues and find hidden objects to locate the recipes and save their cooking dreams.

name: Shopping Clutter 8: From Gloom to Bloom
description: Shopping Clutter 8 - From Gloom to Bloom surrounds you with a floral Puzzle festival. When Auntie Sheep decides to search for rare flowers, she leaves her beautiful shop in hands of Sloth Walker. Yet trouble ensues! Can you clean up the shop before Auntie Sheep returns?

name: Camelot: Wrath of the Green Knight - Collector's Edition
description: Camelot: Home of King Arthur’s court… and intrigue! When the Lady of the Lake goes missing, her husband the Green Knight blames King Arthur, threatening the peace of Camelot for all…

name: No Legs? No Problem!
description: Be the first to reach the goal in this intense 4 player racing game. Challenge your friends to a free for all or team up in an epic 2v2 race battle. Use your abilities to grief your enemies, or boost yourself to the finish line.

name: The Wailer
description: A highly stylized horror adventure game set in the depths of an ancient dungeon. With torch in hand, explore and find a way to escape before falling prey to the unspeakable horror that lurks within.

name: Spook Bowl
description: In Spook Bowl, lead your team of monstrous college athletes in a turn-based ball game like no other. Assemble a winning team with the unique abilities and stories of each character. Find your own way to score and unravel the enigmatic secrets of this university tournament.

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Jingiskan's Jinkun/Mascot Character
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Jingiskan's Jinkun/Mascot Character (Buster)

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Puimo/Mascot Character
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Puimo/Mascot Character (Buster)

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster) - Nagomi Shibakko/Mascot Character
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Nagomi Shibakko/Mascot Character (Buster)

name: Unicyclist
description: A toy platformer that's easy to learn, hard to master.

name: Schoolmare
description: Schoolmare is a survival horror game where you fall in love with a teacher. But it was a trap… You need to get out of the school and not be killed by a horrible monster.

name: VR Tribes: Non-VR Edition
description: VR vs PC. Show which player is stronger. VR TRIBES is an action-packed online multiplayer battle. One in VR and up to three as PC players. As VR player you have to conquer the island. The PC players have to join together to attack and defeat the VR player.

name: The Seven Awakenings: I Randall
description: Run your own shop in the Middle Ages. Manage your economy and serve your customers well. Collect the elements to discover who you were in your previous life and fight off bandits if necessary. Unveil the veil of prophecies and discover your own secret.

name: Bold Moves
description:
What do you get when you combine match 3, word puzzles, and inspirational quotes? A match 3 made in heaven! Get your daily dose of positivity with Bold Moves; the positively relaxing (and challenging) match 3 word puzzle game.
Match 3 colors to collect letter tiles, break through obstacles, and solve the phrase to find inspiration from motivational quotes and positive affirmations. Earn rewards and boosters, progress through chapters of puzzles, and win limited-time events.

name: Rival Stars Basketball
description:
Rival Stars Basketball gives you the control. Draft extraordinary players, plan your strategy and unleash your team on real opponents from around the world in thrilling card battles. Make heat of the moment plays to gain the lead as tension builds. Then at pivotal moments get thrown into 3D on court action! Do you pass or do you go for the 3 pointer? Your choice can make or break your success.
There are tons of ways to win powerful rare players and a world of ever-evolving rivals to pit them against. Shoot for Stardom, with Rival Stars Basketball!

name: Zoo Park Story
description:
Ready to build the zoo of your dreams? Depart on wild adventures to find exotic fauna, exploring all manner of environments from savanna to tundra, jungle and beyond! Give your new animal friends a home and take your zoo to the top of the industry!
Savor the thrill of opening day. Feed the animals in your burgeoning lineup—even give them the occasional treat to show you care! From apples to acorns, meat, and more, tailor your critters' diet according to their natural habitat. On that note, do the same with the surrounding flora too!

name: Doctor Who: Cosmic Collider
description: Destroy various blocks to obtain images of the Doctor Who's 2008 Christmas Special, The Next Doctor.

name: Try Again
description: You're Benny, a test character trapped in an unfinished game by a figure called The Designer. She's up against a deadline for her publisher which means it's your last day as a test character. Navigate the facility, dodge game-dev chaos and defy expectations to become the main character.

name: Doctor Who: Clockwork Quest
description: Seven crystals have been hidden in different time zones - scan each zone and press the space bar to retrieve them. Use your mouse to freeze the other robots and collect the keys they leave behind to re-wind your own robot.

name: Indagator
description: A visual novel fangame.

name: Disgraced: Western Warfare Pack
description: The Western Warfare Pack DLC for Disgraced brings several new weapons and gear from the West as you fight for justice in Feudal Japan against the evil Shogun!

name: Go! Go! Hamster Chef!
description: Help Hamster Chef cook yummy dishes for his animal pals! This is a fun, innocent game which does not contain any dark twist.

name: Sybil is Haunted
description: Sybil has a very scrambled mind. Some days she just needs you to push her along. Help Sybil navigate the horrors of her bedroom and see what adventures await. Find every ending to see what lays in her future. HYIPHYOP

name: Zelda: Interconnected Strongholds
description: This hack has a small overworld, but it is filled to the brim with every item in the game along with 9 dungeons in total. Every single cave and house is redesigned, and there are a bunch of graphic edits and palette changes. As with 18 Hours Past, there’s kind of a story set in place but it’s not the main focus of the game. There are some custom events though that relate to the story, so the creator at least tried to put more of a story in.

name: Laid-Back Camp: Have a nice day!
description: The first smartphone game with all the elements of the TV anime "Laid-Back Camp" is finally here! Familiar characters such as Nadeshiko Kagamihara, Rin Shima, Chiaki Ōgaki, Aoi Inuyama, and Ena Saitō engage in rich dialogue with motion and full voice acting, as well as over 1,000 camping gear and vehicles, delicious-looking camp meals, and beautiful scenery from Yamanashi, Nagano, and Shizuoka, among other locations. More elements from the TV anime 'Laid-Back Camp' are expected to be appeared soon!

name: A Bouquet of My Beloveds
description: Sekai Project will release Cosmillica's "A Bouquet of My Beloveds" (Subete no Koi ni, Hanabata wo.), a yuri visual novel, in English for PC via Steam.

name: Water Wheel
description: Water Wheel is a short adventure game where you must escape a strange apartment. The machine that delivers food to the residents has stopped working. Now your only choice is to find a way out.

name: Stellata Waterway
description: An endless runner heavily inspired by the hoverboard levels from Klonoa 2 and retro PlayStation graphics.

name: Beyond the Veil: A Kitty Cat Mystery Adventure
description: Beyond the Veil: A Kitty Cat Mystery Adventure is a 2D puzzle platformer where you and your trusty assistant switch between charming detective and adorable kitty cat to solve the case of your missing coworker.

name: Bloobo
description: Get ready for hours of physics and fun with Bloobo! Design and test mind-bending physics puzzles in your quest to restore creativity worldwide.
